endpoints./menu: This returns all the menu for all weeks and times of the day.

queries.type: Specify the type of food you have, South Veg, North Veg, North Non-Veg, South Non-Veg
queries.day: Enter the day for which you want to get the menu, enter in captialised form.
queries.time: Time of the day, Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner.
